ยง1Armors and weapons gain rarities, stats and attributes. Some items may not gain a rarity immediately, in this case, interact with any interactable block (anvil, crafting table etc) or open your Curios tab.

Legendary and Mythic items can only be obtained through upgrading.
Armor and weapon rarities are upgraded in anvils with Scrap Essence items and when upgraded, the stats and the attributes are rolled.

Accessories are upgraded in Smithing Tables with Accessory Upgrade Templates and Gem Clusters obtained from dissolving accessories.

Stats can be rolled with Pearls, and attributes can be rolled with Shards. Accessories do not have randomized stats.

Common: 40%
Uncommon: 30%
Rare: 20%
Epic: 10%

Items gain extra amounts of stats and higher stat rolls and smaller negative stat rolls depending on their rolls.
